Module edu.citadel.cvm
Package edu.citadel.cvm.assembler

Class Scanner

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.Scanner
public class Scanner
extends java.lang.Object
Performs lexical analysis for CVM assembly language.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Scanner​(Source source)
    Initialize scanner with its associated source and advance to the first token.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void advance()
    Advance to the next token in the source file.
    void advanceTo​(Symbol[] symbols)
    Advance until the symbol in the source file matches one of the symbols in the given array or until end of file is encountered.
    Position getPosition()
    Returns a reference to the position of the current symbol in the source file.
    Symbol getSymbol()
    Returns a reference to the current symbol in the source file.
    Token getToken()
    Returns a copy of the current token in the source file.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Scanner

      public Scanner​(Source source) throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize scanner with its associated source and advance to the first token.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • getToken

      public Token getToken()
      Returns a copy of the current token in the source file.

    • getSymbol

      public Symbol getSymbol()
      Returns a reference to the current symbol in the source file.

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Returns a reference to the position of the current symbol in the source file.

    • advance

      public void advance() throws java.io.IOException
      Advance to the next token in the source file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • advanceTo

      public void advanceTo​(Symbol[] symbols) throws java.io.IOException
      Advance until the symbol in the source file matches one of the symbols in the given array or until end of file is encountered.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
